briefdescription.para: flag to trigger synchronised buffer writing
flag to disable any writing (turns this into a null buffer)

detaileddescription.para: flag to indicate that GAMBIT is attempting to resume a run, so we need to hook into existing output streams rather than create new ones
flag to indicate whether full buffers should be written to disk, or whether they should be send to the master node via MPI. Different printers can use different modes.

briefdescription.para: flag to indicate the buffer access mode (i.e. read/write)
flag to indicate if the sync buffer is full (and ready for sending/dumping)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &l, const int vID, const uint i, const bool sync, const bool sil, const bool r, const bool mode, const char a)
memberdef.name: VertexBufferBase

detaileddescription.para: MPI mode error Put in functions which should not run if MPImode=false

Skip several/many positions NOTE! This is meant for initialising new buffers to the correct position. If buffer overflows it may get cleared without data being written, so don't use this in other contexts.
